intro: Sacoglottis mattogrossensis var. mattogrossensis, commonly known as the Brazilian arrowroot, is a flowering plant native to the Amazon region of Brazil. Its ornamental value is notable due to its vibrant foliage and unique inflorescence. However, it is less commonly cultivated compared to other members of its family.
